name: Be Buddies With Miku! (Venting game)
description:
In this game, you can hang out with Hatsune Miku and tell her how you're feeling!

You can;

  • Hang out with Hatsune Miku.
  • Choose your own name (you must choose it again after every reboot)
  • Choose your emotion from Happy or Sad

Sprites aren't by me!! They're from DeviantArt. The BGM is airplane mode instrumental by Limbo.

I did Miku's speech.
